channel.title: CVE Feed for Zyxel -- NWA110AX firmware
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Zyxel -- NWA110AX firmware

item.title: CVE-2022-45854|2024-08-03T14:24:03.048Z -- zyxel -- nwa110ax%20firmware
item.description: An improper check for unusual conditions in Zyxel NWA110AX firmware verisons prior to 6.50(ABTG.0)C0, which could allow a LAN attacker to cause a temporary denial-of-service (DoS) by sending crafted VLAN frames if the MAC address of the vulnerable AP were intercepted by the attacker.
